text: Lucerne is a ghost town in Center Township, Columbiana County, Ohio, United States. ==History== A post office was established at Lucerne in 1893, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1901 The community was named after Lake Lucerne, in Switzerland. ==References== Category:Geography of Columbiana County, Ohio Category:Ghost towns in Ohio Category:1893 establishments in Ohio
title: Lucerne, Columbiana County, Ohio
